page.title: 18Employment Brockhampton
page.content: Most people around the Brockhampton and Bringsty area go to work at Bromyard also Worcester and Hereford.A teacher living on Bringsty Common commutes to Birmingham. The licensee of the Live And Let Live Public House on Bringsty common,he also has a Post round.He walks an average of 10 miles a day.If he goes on holiday a lady takes his place for a week or two.This is a farming area and people are employed on the farms. Many people are employed locally in the seasonal work associated with farms and orchards.Fruit and orchards require attention such as tying and pruning,this is done by casual labour. Fruit when ripe has to be picked,weig_ hed and packaged many people find employment in this way.
